source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_00<tab>Curious Gorge would share with you the location of the final piece of relic armor.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_00<tab>隠れ滝のキュリアス・ゴージは、もっとも危険な「古の戦装束」が封じられた地を教えてくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_01<tab>Despite his misgivings about your ability to fully control its power, Curious Gorge shares with you the location of the final piece of his ancestors' lost armor. Seek it out in the waters of the Weeping Saint in the central highlands of Coerthas. Curious Gorge, recent experiences still weighing heavily on his heart, will stay behind.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_01<tab>もっとも危険な「古の戦装束」の場所を教わった。クルザス中央高地の「聖ダナフェンの落涙」で「古の戦装束」を探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_02<tab>No sooner had you taken the armor into hand than did Curious Gorge appear to claim it from you with nary a word of explanation. What has brought about this change of heart from your mentor? Return to Hidden Falls to seek an explanation.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_02<tab>「古の戦装束」を手に入れようとしたところ、キュリアス・ゴージが「古の戦装束」の鎧を持ち帰ってしまった。東ラノシアの隠れ滝にいる「キュリアス・ゴージ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_03<tab>Curious Gorge offers his apology for his actions, explaining that he cannot trust you, himself, or anyone to wear the armor until the would-be wearer's strength is demonstrated beyond a shadow of a doubt. He bids you to return to your training while he studies the texts to see how such strength might be proven.

※The next warrior quest will be available from Curious Gorge upon reaching level 50.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_SEQ_03<tab>キュリアス・ゴージと話した。「古の戦装束」の鎧を身につけるには、「原初の魂」が暴走しない「強さ」を証明する必要があるという。キュリアス・ゴージは「古の戦装束」の所有権をかけて、勝負をもちかけてきた。キュリアス・ゴージが勝負方法をつきとめるまで、鍛錬に励もう。

※戦士のレベルが50以上になると、キュリアス・ゴージから次の戦士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_TODO_00<tab>Search for the relic armor at the Weeping Saint.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_TODO_00<tab>聖ダナフェンの落涙で古の戦装束を探す
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_TODO_01<tab>隠れ滝のキュリアス・ゴージと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000<tab>You would truly seek the ultimate relic of my people? The armor that could consume the very soul of the most puissant warrior? Very well, if you are truly convinced of your readiness, I will not be the one to stand in your way.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000<tab>「古の戦装束」の鎧を……
一番危険な戦装束を、本当に取りにいくんだな？
だったら、鎧が封じられてる地を教えてやる。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001<tab>But I beg of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the moment you feel yourself losing control, and your inner beast overcoming you, cast the armor aside. Cast it from the highest mountain or into the depths of the ocean, I care not.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001<tab>でも、くれぐれも軽い気持ちで身に着けるなよ！
もしも「原初の魂」が震えすぎて、
魔物のようになっちまったら……

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002<tab>For once the beast consumes your soul, there is no going back. You will rage on, a monster, leaving naught but carnage in your wake. The realm will bleed, and history will repeat itself. I cannot allow this to happen.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002<tab>戦士はまた、昔みてえに追い出されちまう！
オラ、石コロだらけ、知り合いだらけの里に帰るのは
御免だからな！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003<tab>No, my people have been shunned long enough. I would see the coming of a new age, in which warriors protect the weak and are loved and admired by the people of the realm. My years of battle and sleepless nights spent poring over the ancient texts─all has been for this day!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003<tab>オラ、悪い蛮族や魔導兵器を相手に大活躍して、
戦士の仲間をたくさん集めんだ！
知らない人をたくさん助けてえんだ！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_004<tab>Brother... I know not where fate has led you. And yet I feel certain that, in spirit, you stand with me today. Together, we will restore the honor of our people.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_004<tab>兄者は……大丈夫かな。
「古の戦装束」の場所ぐらい、読み解いてるはずだけど。
……いや、兄者なら大丈夫だよな。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_005<tab>...You must forgive my sentiment, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As I said, this has been a long time coming. The breastplate you seek is in the highlands of Coerthas, at the spring they call the Weeping Saint. I...will stay behind. The events at Wineport still weigh heavy on my heart.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_005<tab>おっと「古の戦装束」の鎧がある場所だよな？
クルザス中央高地の「聖ダナフェンの落涙」だ。
オラは……行くのはやめておく、ちょっと不安なんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010<tab>Hand over the breastplate, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. After much wrestling with the thought, I simply cannot entrust such a relic to an outsider who may be overwhelmed by its power.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_010<tab>見つけたか……。
だが、この鎧はオメに渡せねえ、オラが預かっとく。
だいたい、鎧の場所を突きとめたのはオラだしな。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_011<tab>I return now to Hidden Falls. If you would have words with me, then come. I will not run away.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_011<tab>文句があんなら、いつもの「隠れ滝」に来い。
オラは、逃げも隠れもしねえ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I am sorry. I did not mean for things to happen like this, but I had no choice.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020<tab>……オメがせっかく見つけた鎧を
横取りするような格好になってすまねえな。
戦士の威厳を保つには、こうするしかねえんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_021<tab>I have wrestled long and hard with the matter, but this is my decision. I cannot trust you with this power when I do not even trust myself.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_021<tab>オラだって、あの鎧を着るつもりはねえ。
ハンパな戦士が鎧を着れば、
「原初の魂」が暴走しちまうからな。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_022<tab>Aye, that's right: I won't attempt to don the plate again, either─nor will anyone. Not until I have proof that there is one with a will strong enough to withstand the beast's siren call.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_022<tab>鎧を身につけるには、
「原初の魂」が暴走しない「強さ」が必要だ。
これを証明できないかぎり、誰にもあの鎧を着させねえ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_023<tab>Peer deep within your soul, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Peer into the eyes of the beast that stares back at you. Can you truly say that you can engage the monster in battle and emerge victorious?
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_023<tab>だから……そうだ！
どっちが鎧にふさわしいか、競争しねえか？
競争に勝ったほうが、鎧を受け取ることにすんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_024<tab>I shall return to the tome. If there are any answers to be found, they lie within those pages. In the meantime, continue your training, that you might find an answer of your own.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_CURIOUSGORGE_000_024<tab>どうやって「強さ」を証明するかは、調べてみる。
それまで、せいぜい鍛錬を積んどけよ。
オメ、また新しい技覚えたようだしな。
TEXT_JOBWAR451_01053_ACCESS_MESSAGE<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
